name: UPRN:010008993390
notes: Construction of a part 3, part 4 storey building containing 6no. residential dwellings (Use Class C3) together with cycle, refuse storage and landscaping works.

name: UPRN:010009017702
notes: Conversion of existing primary school building into a 21 bedroom HMO including exterior alterations, additional windows, cycle and bin storage.

name: UPRN:010034509461
notes: Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to deliver a five-storey building (plus enlargement of the existing basement level) comprising a 579 sqm retail unit (Use Class A1) at basement and part ground floor and a total of 28 residential (Class C3) units (8 x one-bed, 9 x two-bed, 11 x three-bed) across part ground floor and all upper floors together with associated vehicle parking, amenity space and landscaping.

name: UPRN:010008996671
notes: Prior approval for change of use of the existing warehouse building (Use Class B8) to 7No. self-contained flats (Use Class C3). (This application affects the setting of a Grade II Listed Building)

name: UPRN:010023994688
notes: Demolition of existing dwelling house redevelopment of the site to accommodate 7 x family dwelling houses (2 x 4 bed, 3 x3 bed and 2 x 2 bed) and 3 flats (2 x2 bed and 1 x 3 bed) with private and communal amenity, cycle, car parking and refuse facilities.

name: UPRN:000046251892
notes: Development of vacant land to provide 9 new residential homes consisting of 3 No: 1-Bed / 2 person, 3 No: 2-Bed / 3 person, 1 No: 2-Bed / 4 person and 2 No: 3-Bed / 5 person units in a 4 storey building.

name: UPRN:010094370739
notes: A terrace of mews houses comprising 5No. 3B houses and a set of 2No. 4B semi-detached houses at the end of Radlett Close facing the southern side of Atherton Mews. The proposals include a total of 15 parking spaces and associated landscaping, refuse and cycle storage.

name: UPRN:010008992217
notes: Demolition of existing building on site; erection of a 4 storey building comprising 9 residential apartments and commercial floorspace (Application site is located within the Forest Gate Town Centre Conservation Area and affects the setting of a Grade II Listed Building - Emmanual Church.)

name: UPRN:010008992232
notes: Demolition of existing building and erection of new building comprising ground floor commercial and 9 residential units.

name: UPRN: 000046098532
notes: Demolition of existing building; erection of a part 1, part 3, part 5/6 storey building comprising replacement church and community use (Class D1) over ground and basement levels together with 17 self-contained flats (comprising 9 x 1, 4 x 2 and 4 x 3 bed), together with associated cycle parking and landscaping.

name: UPRN:10008994570
notes: Pending signing of S106 agreement.. Redevelopment of 18 residential units (7x3 bed, 8x2bed and 3x1bed) over 6 floors.

name: UPRN:46251374
notes: Demolition of existing single storey offices and Construction of block A 1 x 2 bed flat, 1 x 3 bed flat and Block B 2 x 1 bed flats separated by a communal garden and associated bin and cycle stores

name: UPRN:10034508058
notes: Proposed redevelopment of site to provide an A4 Use and 9 self-contained residential units comprising of 1 x 5 bedroom house, and 1 x 1 bedroom, 4 x 2 bedroom and 3 x 3 bedroom flats, including refuse storage, cycle storage and car parking spaces

name: UPRN:46088482
notes: Demolition of existing property and redevelopment of the site to provide 3-5 storey buildings for 12 residential units comprising 3 x 1bed, 4 x 2bed, 5 x 3bed flats including one car parking space, cycle and refuse storage.

name: UPRN:10008994946
notes: Construction of five storey building comprising commercial unit B1a at ground floor, 6 x three bedroom flats and 2 x one bedroom flats in the upper floors and roof space.

name: UPRN:010008992775
notes: Demolition of existing two storey dwelling and construction of a building with 6 residential units comprising of 4 x 3 bed and 2 x 1 bed.

name: UPRN:000046091523
notes: Redevelopment of disused former pub garden for creation of 5 residential units comprising of 1 x 1bed , 1 x 2bed, 1 x 3bed apartments with part basement floor level and 1 x 3bed , 1 x 4bed houses with terraces including refuse and cycle storage on ground level.

name: UPRN:010008992963
notes: Retention of current building, and the construction of 3 storey extension to consist of 6 flats (3 x one bedroom flats, 2 x two bedroom flats and 1 x 3 bedroom flat)

name: UPRN:010034508054
notes: Demolition of existing building and redevelopment of the site to provide flexible commercial floorspace (Use Class A1, A2, B1, D2) and 12 residential units (comprising of 1 x studio, 2 x 1 bed, 6 x 2 bed and 3 x 3 bed flats) along with landscaping, cycle parking and associated works.

name: UPRN:010009002705
notes: Redevelopment of the site including the retention of the existing Cart & Horses Public House, demolition of the existing extension to the rear of the existing public house and the provision of 29 new residential dwellings within a part 3 / part 7 storey building, plus basement level, with associated residential amenity space, landscaping and cycle parking.

name: UPRN:010008990417
notes: Demolition of an existing two storey public house and adjacent garage court and the erection of two new buildings comprising of a four storey block and a three storey block of self contained apartments to provide a total of 25 residential units.

name: UPRN:010008993409
notes: Erection of new four storey building on land to the rear of Nos 304-306 Romford Road to provide 1 x 3 bedroom apartment and 4 x 1 bedroom apartments.

name: UPRN:010008998930
notes: Demolish existing warehouse, change of use to residential and erect 2 storey and attic development of 9 apartments to include 3x3 bed flats, 5x2 bed flats and 1x1 bed flats.

name: UPRN:010009018340
notes: Ground, first, second and third floor extension, proposed alterations to 8 existing flats and creation of 5 additional flats to provide a total of 13 self-contained flats.

name: UPRN:010008991173
notes: Proposed demolition of existing detached house and erection of six dwelling houses and two flats.

name: UPRN:010034508055
notes: Demolition of existing building and construction of four storey building with eight residential units (Class C3) comprising of (2 x 1 bed, 4 x 2 bed and 2 x 3 bed) with associated landscaping works, refuse and cycle storage.

name: UPRN:010008997811
notes: New build redevelopment of existing building to provide revised space for public house at ground and basement floors & create 6 flats above. A total of 4x 2 bed flats will be created split two per level at first and second floor level. 2 duplex flats with 3 bedrooms will be introduced at third floor with their living areas located in on top floor.

name: UPRN:010008996220
notes: Conversion and proposed extensions to existing property including new additional third floor to provide 1No (Class A2) commercial use at basement and part of ground floor level and 8No residential units comprising of 4 x 1 bed, 1 x 2 bed, 3 x 3 bed flats.

name: UPRN:000046037050
notes: Re-development of site to provide a mixed-use scheme comprising of: B1(a) ground floor use in the Grade II Listed former public house, and eight residential units in total (three units in the former public house and five units in a new build residential element infilling the space in between No.98 and No.92 High Street). Repair and refurbishment of Grade II Listed former public house building, including second floor rear extension to facilitate delivery of residential units. Provision of associated refuse and cycle storage, amenity space, and landscaping (Application site is a Grade II Listed Building - Coach and Horses Public House).

name: UPRN:010008995449
notes: Proposed development at an unused land to the West of 37 Salmen Road to erect a four storey building for 7 new homes.

name: UPRN:000046255151
notes: Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment to provide a 5 storey building comprising of a place of worship at ground floor level with 4 storeys of residential units comprising of 8 x 1 bed , 3 x 2 bed and 7 x 3 bed.

name: UPRN:010094371331
notes: Proposed change of use of a building from Office (Use Class B1) to a use falling within Use Class C3.

name: UPRN:010094369683
notes: Construction of a building to provide 7 residential units comprising 2 x 1 bed units, 3 x 2 bed units and 2 x 3 bed units.

name: UPRN:010094370756
notes: Erection of three buildings within the rear car park of 101-123 Chobham Road, to provide for 4 x 3 bed apartments, 3 x 2 bed apartments and 2 x 1 bed semi-detached houses, with associated landscaping and improvement works to the whole site.
